text: The Ford Maverick is a compact pickup truck made by Ford since 2021. == History and Features == In 2019 Ford announced that the company plans to make a small pickup truck that uses the same platform of the Ford Focus. In 2020, a tailgate photo was leaked to the press revealing that the pickup truck would use the name Maverick that was used on a compact car made by Ford from 1970 to 1979. The production began on September 2021. and went on sale in late 2021 as a 2022 model. but in 2022 Ford suspended the orders and said it intended to resume the orders from 2023 model year. The Maverick has a 2.0 turbo EcoBoost gasoline engine and a gasoline hybrid version that has a 2.5 liter gasoline engine combined with a 88 Kw (118 hp) electric motor the Pickup Truck has a 8-speed automatic transmission (turbo version only) and the hybrid version has a Ford HF45 transmission it was facelifted in 2024 as a 2025 model. == Markets == The Ford Maverick is sold only in South and North America. == References == Category:Ford automobiles Category:Vehicles Category:Pickup trucks Category:2020s automobiles
